At 8:46 am Hijackers deliberately crashed American Airlines Flight 11 into the North Tower of the WTC,

At 9:03am Hijackers deliberately crashed United Airlines Flight 175 into the South Tower of the WTC,

at 9:37am Hijackers deliberately crashed American Airlines Flight 77 into the Pentagon,

At 10:03am After learning about the other attacks passengers on United Airlines Flight 93 launch a counterattack on hijackers, seize control of the aircraft, causing the hijackers to crash the plane into an empty field.

Many lives were lost and America changed forever. Please remain silent.

Thank you.

Mr. Erspamer
Principal
